title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 22.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 22.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

Section
400-a
of the Vehicle and Traffic Law authorizes the Commissioner of Motor Vehicles to
refuse to register any vehicle or class of vehicles for use on the public
highways where he determines that the characteristics of such vehicle or class
of vehicles make such vehicle or class of vehicles unsafe for highway
operation. The provisions of this Part implement the authority granted under
section
400-a
of the Vehicle and Traffic Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
22.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
